snippet: Twenty-four Masters rookies are in this year’s field, a modern-era record, increasing the chances that someone will become the fourth player to win in his debut.
lead_paragraph: Twenty-four Masters rookies are in this year’s field, a modern-era record, increasing the chances that someone will become the fourth player to win in his debut.

headline.main: Golfers Hoping for Winning Introduction to Masters
headline.print_headline: Golfers Hoping for Winning Introduction to Masters
